title: A sermon preached before the Kings most excellent Majestie, in the cathedrall church of Durham Upon Sunday, being the fifth day of May. 1639. By the Right Reverend Father in God, Thomas Lord Bishop of Duresme. Published by his Majesties speciall command.
author: Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
